about.title: About
about.p0: I'm a freelance front-end developper from Nantes,  France.
about.p1: In 2016 I graduated from the National Institue of Applied Sciences (INSA) in Lyon and got my Engineering Degree in Mechanics.
about.p2: After 6 years working in the fields of luxury goods and automobiles, I decided to follow my passion and become a web developer.
about.p3: After finishing Codecademy's Front-End development course and several months of practicing what I had learned, I started freelancing  in December 2023.

contact.title: Let's work
contact.mail: Want to work together on a project?
